sec.title: System for the measurement of inclination as regards stability

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: For checking the stability under tramming, the rig shall be equipped with a measuring system, for example an inclinometer.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: The measuring system shall show the operator the actual absolute forward, backward and lateral inclination of the drill mast (when this is relevant to the stability).

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: If major parts of the rig can be moved horizontally and this has an effect on the stability, the operator shall be able to determine the position of these parts from the operator's position.
